actions.name: Open Note
actions.description: Open a note identified by its title or id and return its content.

parameters.name: x-success
parameters.description: Your x-success callback will be called with the following parameters

options.description: is_trashed - ”yes” if the note is trashed.
modificationDate - note modification date in ISO 8601 format.
creationDate - note creation date in ISO 8601 format.

actions.name: Create Note
actions.description: Create a new note and return its unique identifier. Empty notes are not allowed.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: a comma seperated list of tags.

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: if ”yes” pin the note to the top of the list.

parameters.name: filename
parameters.description: file name with extension. Both ”file” and ”filename” are required to successfully add a file.

parameters.name: open_note
parameters.description: if ”no” do not display the new note in Bear’s main or external window.

parameters.name: x-success
parameters.description: Your x-success callback will be called with the following parameters.

actions.name: Add Text
actions.description: Append or prepent text to a note identified by its title or id.

parameters.description: If ”no” do not display the new note in Bear’s main or external window.
